section.name: IRC Endpoint URL
section.p: The IRC endpoint defines the endpoint URL as follows:

The mandatory nickname is the IRC nick name to be used (IRC identifies users by a nickname.) The mandatory server is a host name or an IP adderss of the IRC server. The optional TCP-port specifies the TCP port of the IRC daemon (if ommitted, 6667 is assumed as the default.)
